answers.answer: You should see a gastro for that there could be serious problems. I have a friend who had problems with rectal bleeding and pain and she was diagnosed with a colon disease that was similar to Crohn's disease.

question: I am a 21 year old female who has an 8 month old daughter that was delivered 6 weeks premature because I had severe preeclampsia.  I have severe rectal bleeding, such as it is has clots in it..like menstration bleeding. I have fatigue, and I have lower abdominal pain.  I never eat too much if at all. I have no idea what I could have.  Could you help me?
title: What Do I have?
